About Me

Hi! I'm Melvin Vivas (DonvitoCodes), a software engineer and writer focused on leveraging AI for software development and business solutions. I'm passionate about sharing insights and experiences on how AI can transform the way we build software and run businesses.

I'm very active on X (@donvito), where I regularly share insights about AI applications in software development and business use cases. Feel free to reach out and connect with me there - I love engaging with fellow developers and tech enthusiasts!

When I'm not coding or writing, you can find me exploring new AI technologies, contributing to open-source projects, or helping businesses implement AI solutions.
